reviewText: I purchase this Video about a year ago and loved it he shows you how to pick the freshest Produce, Meats and Fish I love the way he teaches in a way that even a naves can understand...

I have purchased several of Chef Todd's videos and he is truly amazing. He is very detailed in his teachings with how and why to choose the best and freshest ingredients for nutrition and health. I am so glad I ran across him.

I purchased this direct over 2 years ago.  I love his items and have purchased other items from Todd.  I have also taken his course of baking .  He is witty and if you want to learn how to cook without a recipe this is a great course.  I had always used a recipe before and now can bake w/o one.

Betty DeMeo
